name: Range Shooter Plus
description:
Grab a gun, shoot it your way, and reach new heights! Would you accept the challenge in the PLUS range?

Range Shooter Plus is a First-Person Shooter made by ccd729 and powered by Unity3D. The player chooses their weapon, and either play without rules with sandbox targets or complete the built-in trials. 

The game overhauled almost everything in the base game Shooting Range Simulator, and features a new weapon, new map, new weapon/equipment system, and 4 scored trials which could be replayed. 

Download and play today! 

The game utilized following free packages: 

Unity Particle Pack 5.x by Unity Technologies 

Clean Vector Icons by PONETI 

Lean GUI by Carlos Wilkes
